front.title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for the oneM2M Partnership Project (oneM2M)

abstract.t: This document describes the Namespace Identifier (NID) for Uniform Resource Namespace (URN) resources published by the oneM2M Partnership Project (oneM2M). oneM2M defines and manages resources that utilize this URN name model. Management activities for these and other resource types are provided by the oneM2M Secretariat.
